quotes: Love yourself first and everything else falls into line. You really have to love yourself to get anything done in this world.
Don't waste your energy trying to change opinions … Do your thing, and don't care if they like it.
You have to believe in yourself when no one else does – that makes you a winner right here.
Trust yourself. You know more than you think you do.
Accept yourself, love yourself, and keep moving forward. If you want to fly, you have to give up what weighs you down.
It is never too late to be what you might have been.
